title: Fall occurs and added to score file after I type gzlog stop

content.raw:
In Qualifier 1, after I have completed the task, and the robot is standing under BDI control, I type "gzlog stop". The sim time freezes at 293.725. At sim time 296.869 the following is added to score.log

1368113591.675,296.869,0.000,0.000,5,1,"Damaging fall detected, acceleration of\ : 4563.49 m/s^2. "

Score.log goes all the way out to 786.869

1368114141.692,786.869,0.000,0.000,5,1,""

I assume that your scoring software detects that I have passed through the last gate, but I just wanted to make sure this bug was noticed.

This is the drcsim-nightly build, updated May 8. gazebo-1.8 drcsim-2.5
content.html:
In Qualifier 1, after I have completed the task, and the robot is standing under BDI control, I type "gzlog stop". The sim time freezes at 293.725. At sim time 296.869 the following is added to score.log

1368113591.675,296.869,0.000,0.000,5,1,"Damaging fall detected, acceleration of\ : 4563.49 m/s^2. "

Score.log goes all the way out to 786.869

1368114141.692,786.869,0.000,0.000,5,1,""

I assume that your scoring software detects that I have passed through the last gate, but I just wanted to make sure this bug was noticed.

This is the drcsim-nightly build, updated May 8. gazebo-1.8 drcsim-2.5
